text:
Albert Watson Newton (born 23 July 1938) is an Australian media personality. He is a member of the Logie Hall of Fame and is a four-time Gold Logie award-winning entertainer and radio, theatre and television presenter. He has hosted shows such as "In Melbourne Tonight", "New Faces", "Good Morning Australia", "20 to 1" and "Bert's Family Feud".
Newton was born in Fitzroy, Victoria. He is married to Patti Newton ("née" McGrath). The couple have two children, actor Matthew and TV personality Lauren.
